projects.name: UCAB Forms
projects.description: A progressive web app to help UCAB students and faculty fill out forms. The application includes many features like a variety of types questions, authentication, realtime collaboration, offline support and many different ways of visualizing and exporting results. Currently, this app is being used by the university.
